trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> derive.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base abstrata a partir da qual as classes <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> derivar.

trans-unit.source: The EncryptedType class represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> derive.
trans-unit.target: A classe de EncryptedType representa a classe base abstrata a partir da qual as classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>derivar.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Estas duas classes contém os dados encriptados reais ou informações de chave na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Para cumprir as normas de encriptação de XML, deve utilizar estas duas classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as normas de encriptação de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma nova instância de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: This class represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> derive.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe representa a classe base abstrata a partir da qual as classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>derivar.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use the two derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Para cumprir as normas de encriptação de XML, deve utilizar as duas classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as normas de encriptação de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""></xref> child element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedProperties>" name="<EncryptedProperties>" href=""></xref> element in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> object in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""> </xref> elemento subordinado para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedProperties>" name="<EncryptedProperties>" href=""> </xref> elemento atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> objeto na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to add `<EncryptionProperty>` child elements to the `<EncryptedProperties>` element.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser utilizado para adicionar `<EncryptionProperty>` elementos subordinados para o `<EncryptedProperties>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedProperties>` element provides additional information for the `<EncryptedType>` element.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptedProperties>` elemento fornece informações adicionais para o `<EncryptedType>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> value for an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"> </xref> valor para uma instância de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `<CipherData>` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: O `<CipherData>` elemento é um elemento necessário na encriptação de XML, que fornece os dados encriptados.

trans-unit.source: It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se tem de conter a sequência de octeto encriptada como texto com codificação base64 do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>propriedade, ou fornecem uma referência para uma localização externa que contém a sequência de octeto encriptado utilizando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about this element, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre este elemento, consulte <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The CipherData property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de CipherData foi definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Encoding" name="Encoding" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Encoding" name="Encoding" href=""> </xref> atributo de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> instância na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade descreve a codificação dos dados encriptados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados encriptados são uma PNG com codificação base64, a codificação pode ser especificada como 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the encoding of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que descreve a codificação dos dados encriptados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""></xref> element for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""> </xref> elemento para a encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionMethod>` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptionMethod>` é um elemento opcional que descreve o algoritmo de encriptação aplicado aos dados encriptados.

trans-unit.source: If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail.
trans-unit.target: Se o elemento estiver ausente, o algoritmo de encriptação deve ser conhecido pelo destinatário ou desencriptação irá falhar.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> objeto que representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperties>" name="<EncryptionProperties>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperties>" name="<EncryptionProperties>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionProperties>` element can contain additional information about the creation of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> instance, such as a date and time stamp or the serial number of cryptographic hardware used during encryption.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptionProperties>` elemento pode conter informações adicionais sobre a criação do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>instância, tal como um carimbo de data e hora ou o número de série de hardware criptográfico utilizado durante a encriptação.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação XML do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedType>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para a saída de `<EncryptedType>` elemento no ficheiro XML.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objeto que representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""> </xref> atributo de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> instância na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `Id` attribute is an optional attribute of the `<EncryptedType>` element that provides a standard method for assigning a string identifier to an element within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: O `Id` atributo é um atributo opcional do `<EncryptedType>` elemento que fornece um método padrão para atribuir um identificador de cadeia para um elemento dentro de um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: A string of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia do <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""> </xref> atributo o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets of sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém de conjuntos de <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<KeyInfo>` element is an optional element that contains information about the key used to encrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: O `<KeyInfo>` elemento é um elemento opcional que contém informações sobre a chave utilizada para encriptar os dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Loads XML information into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as informações de XML para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para carregar um elemento XML existente para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object representing an XML element to use in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objeto que representa um elemento XML a utilizar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The value provided is .
trans-unit.target: The value provided is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeType" name="MimeType" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeType" name="MimeType" href=""> </xref> atributo de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> instância na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que descreve o tipo de suporte de dados encriptados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""> </xref> atributo de um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> instância na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que descreve a forma de texto dos dados encriptados.
